tool_description: This API leverages a unique sourcing strategy to identify current and previous employment for an individual as reported on consumer loan applications, bank headers, alternative credit data reporting and other compiled third party data sources.
title: Employment Search

api_list.name: /GetReport
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://employment-search.p.rapidapi.com/GetReport"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "employment-search.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://employment-search.p.rapidapi.com/GetReport"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "employment-search.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
